room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Just Escape Room in Chicago
review: Went here last night for my brother in laws birthday.  There were six of us.  We did the Attic and finished in 48 minutes (with 4 people who never did an escape room before!)  It was fun.  The staff was absolutely phenomenal!  They couldn't have been nicer and explained everything thoroughly to us novices.  I am going to give this as a gift to my children and their spouses as a Christmas gift.  Thanks for a great time (and a reasonable price!!)

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Just Escape Room in Chicago
review: This was such an amazing experience. We had such a blast and succeed in getting out of the Attic. Can't wait to do it again.

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Just Escape Room in Chicago
review: We did the Attic. Very entertaining and challenging. Great for older kids... my 7 and 9-year-old really enjoyed it! We will be back to try another room for sure!
